description: This file contains a test case class for automatically testing aspects of the eSDK build environment within the OpenEmbedded/Yocto project. It defines setup and teardown procedures, helper methods to generate and retrieve SDK components, and test methods to verify installation and image build functionalities.

classes.name: oeSDKExtSelfTest
classes.description: A self-test case class for the eSDK build environment, including setup, environment configuration, SDK generation, and test methods.

methods.name: get_esdk_environment(env_eSDK, tmpdir_eSDKQA)
methods.description: Retrieve the environment setup script matching a specific pattern in the temporary directory.

methods.name: run_esdk_cmd(env_eSDK, tmpdir_eSDKQA, cmd, postconfig=None, **options)
methods.description: Run a command within the eSDK environment, optionally appending configuration.

methods.name: generate_eSDK(image)
methods.description: Trigger the generation of the eSDK environment using bitbake.

methods.name: get_eSDK_toolchain(image)
methods.description: Retrieve the path to the eSDK toolchain script based on build variables.

methods.name: update_configuration(cls, image, tmpdir_eSDKQA, env_eSDK, ext_sdk_path)
methods.description: Update the eSDK configuration, generate SDK, and set up sstate mirror configuration.

methods.name: setUpClass(cls)
methods.description: Class setup routine: initializes environment, generates SDK, and configures mirror settings.

methods.name: tearDownClass(cls)
methods.description: Class teardown routine: waits for cleanup and deletes temporary directories.

methods.name: test_install_libraries_headers(self)
methods.description: Test to verify the installation of libraries and headers via SDK.

methods.name: test_image_generation_binary_feeds(self)
methods.description: Test to verify image build and binary feed functionalities.

ctags.name: update_configuration
ctags.pattern: /^    def update_configuration(cls, image, tmpdir_eSDKQA, env_eSDK, ext_sdk_path):$/
